Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Asterisk \As"ter*isk\, n. [L. asteriscus, Gr. ?, dim. of 'asth`r star. See {Aster}.] The figure of a star, thus, ?, used in printing and writing as a reference to a passage or note in the margin, to supply the omission of letters or words, or to mark a word or phrase as having a special character. [1913 Webster]
asterisk n : a star-shaped character * used in printing [syn: {star}] v : mark with an asterisk; "Linguists star unacceptable sentences" [syn: {star}]
